title: Tomahawks & Zombies
description: While enjoying the beaches and the ruins of the Yucatán peninsula a zombie virus breaks out. The vacation is over; it's time for survival. With air traffic grounded, Jake Wandering Spirit and his friend’s form a plan to drive the 6427 KM from Cancun to Edmonton, Alberta, Canada amidst the chaos and the unknown. This is one man's journal of survival and travel amidst a zombie apocalypse.
author: Joe Beausoleil
